name: DnsLookup
description: Resolve DNS records (A/AAAA/CNAME/TXT/NS) from the agent. Optional custom resolver.
helpMarkDown: Runs DNS lookups from the agent. Tip: set 'resolver' (e.g. 8.8.8.8) to bypass restrictive corporate DNS during diagnostics.
author: Azure DevOps Support

inputs.name: resolver
inputs.label: Custom DNS server (optional)
inputs.helpMarkDown: IPv4/IPv6 address of a resolver to query (e.g., 8.8.8.8). If empty, the agentâ€™s default resolver is used.
